name: Point b Agency
tagline: Think Hard. Work Hard. Deliver More.
description:
Welcome to Point b. Point b is a creatively-driven, strategically-led agency with expertise in market development, new product commercialization, planning, sales support, and communicating value. What excites most is us helping healthcare and technology organizations reach important business destinations.
Powering our abilities to create vibrant relationships with their customers— using brand, digital, multimedia and design — is an extensive knowledge of the domestic and international healthcare and technology industries, with specific domain expertise in disruptive medical device technology. Point b excels in dynamic, demanding environments. We have a simple strategy — Think Hard. Work Hard. Deliver More.
